function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Analysis of wastewater samples could potentially expose individuals to infectious viral material.","Impact":"Risk of the spread of contagious diseases if proper precautions are not taken.","Mitigation":"Strict adherence to biosafety protocols and use of personal protective equipment (PPE) by laboratory personnel.","Technologies":"Biological safety cabinets, autoclaves, and other biosafety equipment.","People":"Laboratory personnel, researchers, and wastewater treatment plant workers.","Owner":"Laboratory management, research institutions, and wastewater treatment plant management."}]}
